job.title: Web Developer
job.description: HampW Solutions is looking for a skilled web developer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining storefronts for our company You will be working as the sole technical developer on a small team responsibleltbrgtltbrgtTo succeed in this role you will need to be proficient in JavaScript HTML CSS Node JS React JS and have solid knowledge and experience in programming applications C Java XSL would be helpfulltbrgtltbrgtStorefront Web Developer Responsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgt	Website and software application designing building or maintainingltbrgt	Using scripting or authoring languages management tools content creation tools applications and digital medialtbrgt	Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts prioritize needs develop content criteria or choose solutionsltbrgt	Directing or performing Website updatesltbrgt	Performing DNS Management and SSL Management using CloudFlare and IIS respectivelyltbrgt	Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device typesltbrgt	Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education study and participation in conferences workshops and groupsltbrgt	Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recoveryltbrgt	Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards is valid is properly structured and is compatible with browsers devices or operating systemsltbrgt	Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirementsltbrgtltbrgtStorefront Web Developer Requirementsltbrgtltbrgt	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience or Bachelors degree in Web development or related fieldltbrgt	Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications Visual Studio Visual Studio Code preferredltbrgt	Proficient in JavaScript HTML CSS Node JS React JSltbrgt	Proficient in SQL MSSQLltbrgt	Other useful skills C Java XSL XMPie  uStoreltbrgt	Dedicated team playerltbrgt	Great written verbal presentation and communication skillsltbrgt	Knowledge of programming language and technical terminologyltbrgt	Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express themltbrgt	Ability to function well with limited supervision and directionltbrgt	Must maintain solid attention to detail with the ability to follow through on commitmentsltbrgt	Ability to function well with limited supervision and directionltbrgtltbrgtHampW Solutions supports a diverse workforce and is an Equal Opportunity Employer who does not discriminate against individuals on the
